meanings.definition: A slang term for a very unpleasant or dirty place.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned building was full of shithouses, with trash scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The public restroom was a total mess, a real collection of shithouses.
meanings.sent3: I wouldn't want to visit those shithouses even if you paid me!
meanings.sent4: The alley behind the restaurant looked like a row of shithouses, neglected and grim.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie set was designed to look like a series of haunted shithouses.

meanings.definition: Used as an expletive to express frustration or anger.
meanings.sent1: Shithouses! I can't believe I missed the last bus.
meanings.sent2: Oh shithouses, I forgot my keys at home!
meanings.sent3: Shithouses! I spilled coffee all over my new shirt.
meanings.sent4: When the car wouldn't start, he shouted, 'Shithouses!' in frustration.
meanings.sent5: As the storm hit, she exclaimed, 'Shithouses!' at the sudden downpour.
